DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety combine oral contraceptive estradiol valerate dienogest treatment heavy menstrual bleeding
DOC.brief_title: Study 4-phasic Oral Contraceptive Treatment Heavy Menstrual Bleeding
DOC.criteria: Women 18 year old generally good health diagnosis heavy menstrual bleeding without organic pathology , request contraception Willingness use barrier contraception ( e.g. , condom ) screen study completion Willingness use collect sanitary protection ( pads tampon ) provide sponsor compatible alkaline hematin test throughout study completion Current diagnosis organic uterine bleed History endometrial ablation , dilatation curettage within 2 month Visit 1 . Clinically significant pelvic finding ( whether confirm transvaginal ultrasound [ TVU ] ) . Clinically significant abnormal result breast examination ( breast palpation ) . Positive pregnancy test Visit 1 Less three month since delivery , abortion , lactation start Visit 1 Other contraceptive method Any disease condition may worsen hormonal treatment Smokers age 35 Body mass index > 32
